com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.builder

Interface ResourceFactory<T extends Resource>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Resource that the given factory will return.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamoDBResourceFactory, HibernateResourceFactory

    public interface ResourceFactory<T extends Resource>
    The ResourceFactory will create a resource that can be used to by DAC to perform persistence.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T build(java.lang.Class model)
      Build the required resource based on the annotated model.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        T build(java.lang.Class model)
 throws MalformedPersistentModelException
        Build the required resource based on the annotated model.
        Parameters:
        model - The model class to build persistent resource for
        Returns:
        A built Resource
        Throws:
        MalformedPersistentModelException
